snippet.title: Lightyear Frontier - A Fresh Start
snippet.description:
Follow our development here: https://lightyearfrontier.com/
Start your interstellar homestead in this peaceful open-world farming adventure! Build your sustainable exofarm, grow alien crops, and explore a new world full of mystery with up to three friends!
It’s been a long journey across the galaxy, but on the other end, there’s a beautiful world to behold. Begin your fresh start when Lightyear Frontier comes to Xbox Series S/X, PC, and Game Pass!

--ALL GAMEPLAY AND ASSETS SHOWN ARE A WORK IN PROGRESS AND MAY NOT BE REFLECTED IN THE FINAL PRODUCT--

Wishlist on Steam: https://bit.ly/3OuKcSA
Find us on Xbox: https://bit.ly/3OAkOL6

Lightyear Frontier on Socials:
Discord: https://bit.ly/3NBIWx2
Twitter: https://bit.ly/3QeNomQ
TikTok: https://bit.ly/39kIxQr
Instagram: https://bit.ly/3aShlco
Facebook: https://bit.ly/3tqH3uQ
